tool.name: RetroRules

param.name: diameters
param.label: Select the diameters of the reactions rules

tool.help:
RetroRules ==========
Retrieve the reaction rules from `RetroRules <https://retrorules.org/>`_
Input -----
Required:
* **-rule_type**\ : (string) Valid options: retro, forward, all. Return the rules that are in reverse, forward or both direction * **-diamters**\ : (integer list): Valid options: 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 16. The diameter of the rules to return * **-output_format**\ : (string) Valid options: tar, csv. Format output
Ouput -----
* **-output**\ : (string): Path of the output file. Either a TAR (containing a CSV) or CSV list of reaction rules that are in a RetroPath2.0 friendly format
